General.Name: Minaurum Gold Inc
General.Description: Minaurum Gold Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, evaluation, and exploration of mineral properties in Mexico. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. Its flagship project is the Alamos project, which covers an area of 37,928 hectares in Southern Sonora. The company was formerly known as Chava Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Minaurum Gold Inc. in November 2009. Minaurum Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 200 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1S4
